channel.title: Peduncle on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Peduncle on funPlantGenes

item.title: CsAGA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa4G167980 Gene Symbol: CsAGA2 Gene Name: Alkaline α-galactosidase 2 Genome: Cucurbit Genomics Database Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Alkaline α-galactosidase 2 (CsAGA2) plays a pivotal role in mediating source–sink communication in cucumber.

item.title: Iw1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi5g01180 Gene Symbol: Iw1 Gene Name: Inhibitor of wax 1 Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: Using synteny and a large number of F2 gametes, Iw1 was fine-mapped to a sub-cM genetic interval on wheat chromosome arm 2BS, which includes a single collinear gene from the corresponding Brachypodium and rice physical maps.

item.title: OsERF34
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os04g46440 RAPdb gene ID: Os04g0550200 Gene Symbol: OsERF34 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: TaARF12-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2A03G1263300 Gene Symbol: TaARF12-A Gene Name: Auxin response factor 12 Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaARF12-B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2B03G1444700 Gene Symbol: TaARF12-B Gene Name: Auxin response factor 12 Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaARF12-D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2D03G1217700 Gene Symbol: TaARF12-D Gene Name: Auxin response factor 12 Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaPRR95
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS5B02G320500 Gene Symbol: TaPRR95 Gene Name: pseudo-response regulator 95 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Genome-editing of a circadian clock gene TaPRR95 facilitates wheat peduncle growth and heading date.

item.title: TaSAP1-A1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaSAP1-A1 Gene Name: A20/AN1 zinc-finger protein Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Polymorphism of TaSAP1-A1 and its association with agronomic traits in wheat.

item.title: TraesCS5A02G542600
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS5A02G542600 Gene Symbol: TraesCS5A02G542600 Gene Name: transmembrane transporter Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: We identified putative candidate genes that are potentially involved in metal uptake, transport, and assimilation, including TraesCS5A02G542600 on chromosome 5A, which was annotated as a Major Facilitator Superfamily transporter and acted on all the minerals except K.

item.title: ZmVLN2;vln2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb362860 Gene Symbol: ZmVLN2 vln2 Gene Name: villin-like2 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.
